question: Which of the following are the belligerents of the "Battle of Coatepeque, 1863"?
option1: El Salvador and Guatemala Vs. Honduras
option2: El Salvador and Honduras Vs. Guatemala
option3: Guatemala and Honduras Vs. El Salvador
answer: El Salvador and Honduras Vs. Guatemala
explanation: The Battle of Coatepeque was a battle fought between the Guatemala and allied forces of El Salvador and Honduras from 22 to 24 February 1863. The battle ended in a decisive Salvadoran victory.
